title: Youth and credit (Captioned)
viewing_guidelines: CAPTIONED: suitable for hearing impaired viewers
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Youth as consumers
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Credit management
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Consumer credit
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Youth as consumers
description: Geoff Scott presents a dramatised story of a young man who encounters a series of escalating problems with credit, relating to the purchase of a car. The film is then discussed with an invited audience of teenagers and 'experts' with the aim of introducing safe ways of handling credit. The video is accompanied by Teacher's notes. Pt. 1. The forum. Pt. 2. Eddy: a trigger film.
